name: Imperial
primaryTexts: Immediately score 1 public objective if you fulfill its requirements.
Gain 1 victory point if you control Mecatol Rex; otherwise, draw 2 secret objectives, select 1 and shuffle the other in the secret objectives deck.
secondaryTexts: Spend 1 token from your strategy pool to draw 2 secret objectives, select 1 and shuffle the other in the secret objectives deck.
